metadata.title: CVE-2021-45907 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gif2apng 1.9. There is a stack-based bufferoverflow involving a for loop. An attacker has little influence over thedata written to the stack, making it unlikely that the flow of control canbe subverted.

criterions.comment: gif2apng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
